author: @priyanshuvats4066
text: Scaling features helps make gradient descent faster by changing the shape of the cost function Also, it improves the performance of distance-based models by reducing bias. Here is a link for deeper understanding. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P3xPA7XFGCQ
